note: The data_collection.timestamp is when the initial data was collected from criterion.com/shop/browse/list
The data_collection.count is the number of entries that were collected.
This list of entries is a foundation starting point, and should not change accept where missing information for each entry is added where possible.

The order of this list is the default order that it was displayed on the criterion.com/shop/browse/list page, but it is not really important, since it can be sorted and filtered in a tabulated format on a web page.
